bonus: Arcanists increase the Ability Power of your team.
name: Arcanist

set.bonus: Your team gains 20% Ability Power, Arcanists gain an additional 40%
Your team gains 50% Ability Power, Arcanists gain an additional 50%

bonus: Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.
name: Assassin

bonus: Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards gain a shield and taunt adjacent enemies, forcing them to attack the Bodyguard.
name: Bodyguard

bonus: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double the bonus.
name: Bruiser

bonus: Challengers get bonus Attack Speed. Upon scoring a takedown, Challengers dash to a new target and double this bonus for 2.5 seconds.
name: Challenger

bonus: Innate: Colossi are bigger, more powerful, and immune to crowd control effects. However, each Colossus requires 2 team slots.
name: Colossus

bonus: Your team has bonus Magic Resist. Enchanters gain bonus healing and shielding.
name: Enchanter

bonus: Innovators build a mechanical companion to join the battle. The companion receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Innovators' star levels.
name: Innovator

bonus: Your team gains Mana every 2 seconds.
name: Scholar

bonus: Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.
name: Sniper

bonus: Strikers gain bonus Attack Damage.
name: Striker

set.bonus: Jayce adopts melee form when placed in the front 2 rows, and ranged form in the back 2 rows.

bonus: Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.
name: Twinshot

bonus: After dropping below 75% Health, Chemtech champions become chem-powered, gaining Attack Speed, 20% damage reduction, and regenerating a percentage of their maximum Health each second for 8 seconds.
name: Chemtech

bonus: Your team has increased Attack Speed, with an additional increase per augment in the Hexcore.
name: Clockwork

bonus: Debonair champions gain bonus Health and Ability Power. If there is a Debonair VIP in play, they activate their unique bonus. (Sell the old VIP for a chance to see a new one in your Shop.)
name: Debonair

bonus: Enforcers stun enemies at the start of combat. The target breaks free after 4 seconds, or after losing 40% of their maximum Health. Enforcers will not try to stun enemies who are immune to crowd control effects.
name: Enforcer

set.bonus: The enemy who has the most Health.
And the enemy who dealt the most damage last combat.

An ally from the bench can be fed to Tahm Kench once per planning phase, permanently granting him either Ability Power, Health, Armor, or Magic Resist.

        To feed, hold an ally from the bench over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release.

bonus: At the start of combat and every 5 seconds afterwards, the Hexcore sends out a pulse that charges up allied Hextech champions with a shield for 4 seconds. While the shield is active, attacks deal bonus magic damage on hit. This shield does not stack.
name: Hextech

set.bonus: At the start of combat, the Mastermind grants the 2 allies directly in front of him 40 of their starting Mana.

bonus: Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase vs a player, dice rolls add loot to the chest. The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice.
name: Mercenary

set.bonus: Upon winning, roll a 3rd dice that grants bonus loot.

bonus:
Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.

    Cybernetic Enhancement grants bonus stats to Mutants with at least 1 item.
    
    Voracious Appetite strengthens Mutants on each ally's death.
    
    Voidborne executes targets below a Health threshold and deals true damage.
    
    Hyper-Adrenal Glands give a chance for Mutants to deal additional attacks.
    
    Synaptic Web reduces the Mana cost of Mutantsâ€™ Abilities.
    
    Bio-Leeching grants Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of damage dealt) to your team.
    
    Metamorphosis grants stacking bonuses to Mutants at regular intervals.
name: Mutant

bonus: This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 unique Rival unit, as Rivals refuse to work together.
name: Rival

set.bonus:
Vi's mana cost is reduced by 20.

    Jinx gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.

bonus: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap champions turn into full items for the rest of combat. Also, your team gains a shield for each component equipped by your team, including those that are part of a full item.
name: Scrap

bonus: Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.
name: Socialite

set.bonus: and heal for 33% of all damage they deal
all of the bonuses are doubled

bonus: Certain allies are cloaked in shadows, gaining 55 Armor, 55 Magic Resist and 20% Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt.)
name: Syndicate

set.bonus: The Syndicate champion with the lowest percent Health.
Your whole team, and the effects are increased by 60%
After each player combat, a random Yordle is added to your bench for free.
And Yordle's Abilities cost 25% less to cast.

bonus: Veigar is summoned from Yordle Portal when every Yordle is 3-star.
name: Yordle-Lord
